en.noSystemsTitle: Get started with Red Hat Insights
en.noSystemsDescription: With predictive analytics, avoid problems and unplanned                        downtime in your Red Hat environment. Red Hat Insights is                        included with your Red Hat Enterprise Linux subscription.
